name: Cube Miner Remastered
description:
This is a remastered version of the Scratch Game Cube Miner, a game made by legobuzz12 on Scratch. Cube Miner is a game where mine squares that look like ores and stones. Mining ores will give you money, and you upgrade until to get to the INFINITY PICKAXE!!! It's a 2019 classic and a beautiful gem on Scratch.

Controls: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------WASD or the Arrow keys to move 

The + key to change your skin

Space to mine blocks

Click on the yellow box in the top middle of your screen to upgrade your pickaxe!
